title: Data Science Core Skills
text: Core Data Science skills: Python, SQL, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, data cleaning, EDA, feature engineering, model evaluation, cross-validation, model selection, and visualization. Projects should report metrics like accuracy, F1, ROC-AUC, and include reproducibility and README.

title: Data Science Impact Bullets
text: Use action-result bullets: Achieved X by doing Y using Z. Example: Improved F1 from 0.68 to 0.79 by class-weighting and feature scaling; reduced inference latency by 35% via model quantization and ONNX.

title: DS Projects Expectations
text: Good DS projects: clear problem framing, data sourcing, EDA, baseline, model iterations, validation strategy, metrics, error analysis, and deployment notes. Include a concise README with reproduce steps and results.

title: Software Engineering Core Skills
text: Core SWE skills: Java, Python, C++, data structures, algorithms, REST APIs, SQL/NoSQL, testing, CI/CD, debugging, observability (logs/metrics/traces), performance optimization, and documentation.

title: SWE Impact Bullets
text: Quantify outcomes: Reduced API p95 latency by 40% via Redis caching and query optimization; increased unit test coverage from 55%→85% with pytest; decreased deployment failures by 30% with GitHub Actions CI/CD.

title: Frontend Core Skills
text: Frontend fundamentals: JavaScript/TypeScript, React, HTML, CSS, responsive design, a11y, state management, performance optimization, Jest testing, build tooling (Vite/Webpack), API integration.

title: Backend Core Skills
text: Backend essentials: Node.js/Java/Python, REST/GraphQL, authentication/authorization, relational schema design and SQL, caching, queues, observability, security basics (OWASP), error handling, scalability patterns.

title: ATS Formatting Do's
text: Use standard headings (Education, Experience, Skills), simple fonts, no tables/text boxes, single column. Export to PDF. Mirror JD phrases in Skills and Experience with evidence.

title: Keyword Alignment Strategy
text: Mirror key JD terms exactly (e.g., Machine Learning, SQL, React). Place critical skills in Skills and support them with impact bullets. Avoid keyword stuffing—tie to outcomes and tools.

title: Junior Experience Tips
text: If short on experience, highlight substantial projects, internships, and measurable results. Use impact bullets, link to code/demo, and include a README with metrics and how to run.
